channel.title: ::npcreset PI
channel.description: Ive tried to make a command (delta sided) and put it in PI source... but didnt work (OBVIUSLY) I Tried to make ::npcreset but i nee a npcreset and that would be verry apreciated. Thank you!

item.title: ::npcreset PI
item.dc:creator: @iii_jake_iii iii jake iii
item.description:
@iii_jake_iii wrote:

Use this whole command and delete your other one and replace it, this will work.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && c.playerRights > 0){ for (int i = 0; i < Server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].isDead = true; Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } }
And if that doesnt work just add another bracket like this

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && c.playerRights > 0){ for (int i = 0; i < Server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].isDead = true; Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } } } } }
but i think the second one wont work becasue its my last command and it will have more brackets than more.
Hope this works

Read full topic

That’s because different methods are used with do the same thing which are renamed…
